mapper.select:
select
from cost_dg where supplier_id=#{supplierId} and reporting_period=#{reportingPeriod} order by cd_id
mapper.update: update cost_dg set accumulation_fund_radix = #{accumulationFundRadix,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, accumulation_fund_old_radix = #{accumulationFundOldRadix,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, accumulation_fund_old_ratio = #{accumulationFundOldRatio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accumulation_fund_person_ratio = #{accumulationFundPersonRatio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accumulation_fund_company_ratio = #{accumulationFundCompanyRatio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accumulation_fund_company_pay = #{accumulationFundCompanyPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, accumulation_fund_person_pay = #{accumulationFundPersonPay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, accumulation_fund_total = #{accumulationFundTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, accumulation_fund_account = #{accumulationFundAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where reporting_period=#{reportingPeriod} and certificate_number=#{certificateNumber}
mapper.select: select cd_id from cost_dg where reporting_period = #{yearMonth} and certificate_number = #{certificateNumber}
mapper.update:
update cost_dg set pension_radix =#{pensionRadix}, pension_company_pay=#{pensionCompanyPay}, pension_person_pay=#{pensionPersonPay}, pension_company_supplement_pay=#{pensionCompanySupplementPay}, pension_company_person_pay =#{pensionCompanyPersonPay}, pension_supplement_interest =#{pensionSupplementInterest}, pension_late_fees=#{pensionLateFees},
unemployment_radix =#{unemploymentRadix}, unemployment_company_pay =#{unemploymentCompanyPay}, unemployment_person_pay=#{unemploymentPersonPay}, unemployment_company_supplement_pay =#{unemploymentCompanySupplementPay}, unemployment_company_person_pay =#{unemploymentCompanyPersonPay}, unemployment_supplement_interest =#{unemploymentSupplementInterest}, unemployment_late_fees=#{unemploymentLateFees},
injury_radix=#{injuryRadix}, injury_company_pay=#{injuryCompanyPay}, injury_person_pay=#{injuryPersonPay}, injury_company_supplement_pay=#{injuryCompanySupplementPay}, injury_company_person_pay=#{injuryCompanyPersonPay}, injury_supplement_interest=#{injurySupplementInterest}, injury_late_fees=#{injuryLateFees},
procreate_radix=#{procreateRadix}, procreate_company_pay=#{procreateCompanyPay}, procreate_person_pay =#{procreatePersonPay}, procreate_company_supplement_pay=#{procreateCompanySupplementPay}, procreate_company_person_pay=#{procreateCompanyPersonPay}, procreate_supplement_interest=#{procreateSupplementInterest}, procreate_late_fees=#{procreateLateFees},

serious_illness_treatment_radix=#{seriousIllnessTreatmentRadix}, serious_illness_treatment_company_pay=#{seriousIllnessTreatmentCompanyPay}, serious_illness_treatment_person_pay=#{seriousIllnessTreatmentPersonPay}, serious_illness_treatment_company_supplement_pay=#{seriousIllnessTreatmentCompanySupplementPay}, serious_illness_treatment_company_person_pay=#{seriousIllnessTreatmentCompanyPersonPay}, serious_illness_treatment_supplement_interest=#{seriousIllnessTreatmentSupplementInterest}, serious_illness_treatment_late_fees=#{seriousIllnessTreatmentLateFees} where reporting_period = #{reportingPeriod} and certificate_number = #{certificateNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT s.s_id, s.supplier_name, cd.reporting_period, sum(cd.social_security_total+cd.accumulation_fund_total) gongsiHeji, sum(cd.social_security_total) shebaoHeji, sum(cd.accumulation_fund_company_pay) gongjijinGongsi, sum(cd.accumulation_fund_person_pay) gongjijinGeren, sum(cd.accumulation_fund_total) gongjijinHeji FROM cost_dg cd,supplier s WHERE s.s_id = cd.supplier_id AND cd.reporting_period = #{yearMonth} GROUP BY supplier_id

SELECT
FROM cost_dg WHERE reporting_period = #{yearMonth} AND supplier_id = #{supplierId}
